patient_summary.visit_summary: You visited today for right shoulder pain after a rugby injury. The doctor found a dislocated shoulder joint and ordered an X-ray to check for fractures. You will need to keep your shoulder immobilized and may need a closed reduction procedure to put the joint back in place.

tests_ordered.instructions: You will need to keep your shoulder immobilized and may need a closed reduction procedure to put the joint back in place.
tests_ordered.evidence: I don't know like probably like eight or eight or nine eight or nine, okay

follow_up_plan.action: Keep your shoulder immobilized and may need a closed reduction procedure to put the joint back in place.
follow_up_plan.evidence: I don't know like probably like eight or eight or nine eight or nine, okay

lifestyle_recommendations.recommendation: Avoid activities that aggravate the injury
lifestyle_recommendations.evidence: I don't know like probably like eight or eight or nine eight or nine, okay

red_flags_for_patient.warning: Seek urgent care if you experience severe pain, numbness, or tingling in your arm or hand
red_flags_for_patient.evidence: If you press down on your biceps triceps does that hurt?

questions_and_answers.question: What will happen next?
questions_and_answers.answer: We will do an extra to your shoulder joint first to make sure it's just a dislocation and then we can resolve this by doing something called a closed reduction to try to put the joint back in its place
questions_and_answers.evidence: So um it sounds like you have a shoulder dislocation

findings: Patient presents with acute onset of right shoulder pain and limited mobility after a rugby injury.
Patient reports constant pain in the right shoulder, worsened by movement.
evidence: I just came in because I just got into like this incident while I was playing Rugby I Kind of got tackled and then fell onto my right shoulder After I got up I I've been I've just been this had just happened a couple hours ago actually and I've just been in tense pain in my right shoulder and it can't seem to move it at all Okay,
